WHERE status > #{status}
and (items_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or items_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or mem_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') and items_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and items_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and mem_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and cate_name = '남성' or cate_name = '여성' and cate_name = '퍼퓸' or cate_name = '오 드 뚜왈렛' or cate_name = '오 드 퍼퓸' or cate_name = '오 드 코롱' and cate_name = '실리콘' or cate_name = '메탈' or cate_name ='가죽' or cate_name = '탄소 섬유' and cate_name LIKE '%' || #{cate} || '%'
and packaging = 2 or packaging = 3 and packaging = 2 and packaging = 3

ORDER BY items_num DESC
items_price DESC items_price ASC
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM items a JOIN member b ON a.mem_num = b.mem_num JOIN items_cate c ON a.cate_num = c.cate_num LEFT JOIN (select items_num , COUNT(fav_num) AS favcount FROM items_fav GROUP BY items_num)USING(items_num)
mapper.sql: ORDER BY reply_num DESC star_auth DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM(SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM(SELECT reply_num,
REPLACE(REPLACE(reply_content,'<','<'),'>','>') reply_content,
reply_date, reply_mdate, items_num, b.mem_num, mem_nickname, mem_id, mem_photo, reply_photo1, reply_photo2, reply_photo3, reply_photo_name1, reply_photo_name2, reply_photo_name3, star_auth FROM items_reply b JOIN member c ON b.mem_num = c.mem_num JOIN member_detail d ON b.mem_num = d.mem_num) FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT reply_num, COUNT(reply_num) AS favcount FROM items_reply_fav group by reply_num) USING (reply_num) WHERE items_num = #{items_num} )a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
